query:
SELECT 
  lps.page_id,
  lps.page_type,
  lps.marketing_angle_id,
  ma.name as marketing_angle_name,
  lps.color_scheme_id,
  cs.name as color_scheme_name,
  lps.cta_button_id,
  cb.primary_text as cta_primary_text
FROM landing_page_settings lps
LEFT JOIN marketing_angles ma ON lps.marketing_angle_id = ma.id
LEFT JOIN color_schemes cs ON lps.color_scheme_id = cs.id
LEFT JOIN cta_buttons cb ON lps.cta_button_id = cb.id
WHERE lps.page_id = 'black-friday';

LEFT JOIN cta_buttons cb ON lps.cta_button_id = cb.id
